name: MD - Medication Sig Recommender System
description: A recommender system to suggest possible medication sigs for a given drug based on features like patient demographics and prescriber usage history.
role: Worked as the research lead, building and analyzing existing data, transforming it using pandas, and identifying trends and dependencies using matplotlib
Built several POC systems for recommendations, analyzing the effect of features and determining the best feature combinations for recommendation
Developed the final recommendation system using conditional probabilities to recommend medication sigs based on patient demographics
Built a prescriber-prescriber similarity index to find matching prescribers and add variations to recommendations
